Name: ASN.1
Specification: ISO/IEC 8824; X.680 series of ITU-T Recommendations
Binary?: (BER  DER  PER  OER  or custom via ECN)
Human-readable?: (XER  JER  GSER  or custom via ECN)

Name: Common Data Representation (CDR)

Name: Fast Binary Encoding

Name: HOCON

Name: JSON

Standard APIs: (JSON Schema Proposal  ASN.1 with JER  Kwalify  Rx  Itemscript Schema)  JSON-LD

Name: Protocol Buffers (protobuf)

Name: Smile
